snippet.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild – Life in the Ruins
snippet.description:
Through destruction and chaos, life goes on in the world of Hyrule. This is the second official trailer of The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.

Available Now! http://www.zelda.com/breath-of-the-wild/buy-now

#LegendofZelda #Zelda #BreathoftheWild

Forget everything you know about The Legend of Zelda games. Step into a world of discovery, exploration and adventure in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, a boundary-breaking new game in the acclaimed series. Travel across fields, through forests and to mountain peaks as you discover what has become of the ruined kingdom of Hyrule in this stunning open-air adventure.

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com

Like Nintendo on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Nintendo
